@usedefault
h1. Templates Management
{{html:
<div ng-controller="TemplateManagementController" class="margin-top-large">
<div class="table-responsive">
    <table class="table table-striped table-bordered" ng-show="filteredTemplates">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Name</th>
                <th>Description</th>
                <th>Size</th>
                <th>Status</th>
                <!-- <th></th> -->
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr ng-repeat="template in filteredTemplates">
                <td>{[template.name]}</td>
                <td>{[template.description]}</td>
                <td>{[template.size]}</td>
                <td>{[template.status]}</td>
                <!-- <td class="txt-center"><a href="#" ng-click="deleteTemplate( $index )" class="fa fa-times"></a></td> -->
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>
